content.title: Scheme of Grant-in-Aid to Voluntary Organisations Working for the Welfare of Scheduled Tribes
content.beneficiary: Voluntary Organisations working for the welfare of Scheduled Tribes
content.details: This scheme provides financial assistance to NGOs working for the welfare of Scheduled Tribes through a structured application and approval process.
benefits: Financial assistance for projects aimed at the welfare of Scheduled Tribes
Support for ongoing and new projects
Guidance and facilitation through the NGO portal
eligibility: Registered NGOs on the NGO-Darpan Portal
Submission of proposals through the NGO portal
content.application_process: Applications must be submitted online through the NGO portal of the Ministry of Tribal Affairs after registration on the NGO-Darpan Portal.
documents_required: Online application in the prescribed proforma
Utilization certificate of the last released grant
Audited accounts for the previous year
Budget estimates for the financial year
